member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a shading rate combiner (for variable-rate shading, or VRS). For more info, see Variable-rate shading (VRS).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER_PASSTHROUGH
member.summary: Specifies the combiner C.xy = A.xy, for combiner (C) and inputs (A and B).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER_OVERRIDE
member.summary: Specifies the combiner C.xy = B.xy, for combiner (C) and inputs (A and B).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER_MIN
member.summary: Specifies the combiner C.xy = max(A.xy, B.xy), for combiner (C) and inputs (A and B).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER_MAX
member.summary: Specifies the combiner C.xy = min(A.xy, B.xy), for combiner (C) and inputs (A and B).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_COMBINER_SUM
member.summary: Specifies the combiner C.xy = min(maxRate, A.xy + B.xy)`, for combiner (C) and inputs (A and B).
